item.title: Big Tech companies, foreign governments scramble after Trump slaps $100,000 fee on H-1B visas
item.description: The announcement to impose a $100,000 annual fee on H-1B visas sent shockwaves through corporate America.

item.title: Better Home & Finance shares soar more than 40% after Eric Jackson of Opendoor fame recommends it
item.description: The EMJ Capital founder called Better Home "the Shopify of mortgages" and said the company is rebuilding a $15 trillion industry from scratch with AI.

item.title: Fed Governor Stephen Miran pushes case for central bank to slash key interest rate
item.description: Miran outlined the reasons why he thinks the Fed's benchmark interest rate is far too high and should be lowered aggressively.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Oracle, Apple, Metsera, Compass, Kenvue and more
item.description: See which stocks are posting big moves in midday trading.

item.title: Watch new Fed Governor Stephen Miran speak live on the economy and interest rates
item.description: Miran speaks Monday to the Economic Club of New York to explain his views on the economy and monetary policy.
